ps2.1:51.1: cittassa saṅkhepavikkhepaviggahitaṃ → cittassa saṅkhepaṃ vikkhepaṃ viggahitaṃ (sya-all) | cittasaṅkhepavikkhepaṃ avikkhepaṃ viggahitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), dasa ṭhāne sampajānātīti → dasaṭṭhāne (mānasaṃ kusalā) sampajānātīti (bj) | dasaṭṭhānehi sampajānātīti (sya-all) | dasaṭṭhānehi pajānātīti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
